title: Woodlands Regional Library
blurb: Visit Woodlands Library for books and resources.
description: Woodlands Regional Library offers a wide range of books and resources for all ages. It provides a quiet space for reading and studying. The library is open daily with varying hours and is closed on public holidays. Bookdrop and reservation lockers are available subject to mall opening hours. Enjoy a peaceful and enriching experience at Woodlands Library, perfect for families and individuals seeking knowledge and leisure.
Keyword_tag: library, books, reading, resources, study, Woodlands
full_address: 900 S Woodlands Dr, #01-03 Civic Centre, Singapore 730900

title: Woodlands Regional Library: A Community Hub
blurb: A one-stop information center in northern Singapore.
description: Woodlands Regional Library, opened in 2001, spans four storeys in Woodlands Civic Centre. It features an autism-friendly space (Calm Down to The Library), a makerspace (MakeIT), and a children’s section designed as a park with an Enchanted Tree. The library aims to be a comprehensive information and recreational hub, offering diverse programs and resources for all ages, inspired by its proximity to nature reserves. It provides a wide array of books, multimedia resources, and digital services, catering to the educational and leisure needs of the community. The library also hosts workshops, storytelling sessions, and talks.

title: Woodlands Regional Library Activities and Workshops
blurb: Explore diverse activities at Woodlands Regional Library.
description: Woodlands Regional Library offers a variety of workshops and storytelling sessions suitable for families and children. Activities include Chinese storytelling sessions for children aged 4-6, sewing starter sessions, 3D printing workshops, and digital skills workshops for adults. There are also experience booths and talks on topics such as anxiety and depression. The library hosts performances like the Kim Seng Wind Symphony anniversary concert, providing a range of engaging and educational experiences for all ages. These events aim to promote learning, creativity, and community engagement within a family-friendly environment.

title: Woodlands Regional Library Storytelling Session
blurb: Storytelling for 4-6 year olds at Woodlands Library.
description: Join us for an engaging storytelling session at Woodlands Regional Library, designed for children aged 4 to 6 years old. This interactive program aims to foster a love for reading and language through captivating stories and activities. Parents are encouraged to participate alongside their children, creating a memorable and educational experience. The session includes storytelling, songs, and simple craft activities related to the stories. It's a wonderful opportunity for young children to develop their listening skills, expand their vocabulary, and ignite their imagination in a fun and supportive environment. Perfect for families looking for enriching activities.
Keyword_tag: Storytelling, children's activities, library events, reading, early literacy
full_address: 900 S Woodlands Dr, #01-03 Civic Centre, Singapore 730900

title: Textile Paper Lab at Woodlands Regional Library
blurb: Join the Workshop 3D Starter Session at MakeIT!
description: The Textile Paper Lab at Woodlands Regional Library offers a unique space for learning and experimentation with textile and paper crafts. MakeIT at Woodlands Regional Library provides access to equipment and resources for digital fabrication and creative projects. Families can participate in workshops and explore various technologies. The lab is designed to foster innovation and hands-on learning for all ages. It is a great place for kids and adults to learn new skills and create unique projects. The lab provides a collaborative environment for makers and learners.
Keyword_tag: Textile, Paper, Lab, Workshop, 3D, Starter Session, MakeIT, Woodlands Regional Library, Digital Fabrication, Creative Projects, Hands-on Learning
full_address: 900 S Woodlands Dr, #01-03 Civic Centre, Singapore 730900

title: Woodlands Regional Library | MakeIT
blurb: Sewing & 3D printing workshops at Woodlands Library.
description: MakeIT at Woodlands Regional Library offers a variety of workshops and starter sessions focused on sewing and 3D printing. These sessions are designed to introduce participants to the basics of these technologies, providing hands-on experience and fostering creativity. The workshops are suitable for individuals interested in learning new skills and exploring the possibilities of digital fabrication and crafting. Participants can engage in practical projects and gain a foundational understanding of sewing techniques and 3D printing processes in a family-friendly environment.
Keyword_tag: Sewing, 3D printing, workshops, library, crafting, digital fabrication
full_address: 900 South Woodlands Drive Woodlands Library, Level 3 Woodlands Civic Centre, Singapore 730900

title: Woodlands Regional Library - Sewing Starter Session
blurb: Sewing Starter Session @ Woodlands Regional Library
description: The Sewing Starter Session at Woodlands Regional Library offers an introduction to basic sewing techniques. Participants can learn fundamental skills such as threading a needle, basic stitches, and creating simple projects. This session is designed for beginners and provides a hands-on experience in a supportive environment. It is a great opportunity for families and individuals to explore their creativity and develop a new skill. The workshop is suitable for those interested in textile arts and crafts, providing a foundation for future sewing endeavors. The library provides a conducive learning space with necessary equipment and guidance.
Keyword_tag: Sewing, Workshop, Library, Textile, Crafts, Family, Beginner
full_address: 900 S Woodlands Dr, #01-03 Civic Centre, Singapore 730900

title: Woodlands Regional Library Gallery and Facilities
blurb: Explore Woodlands Library's gallery and facilities.
description: Woodlands Regional Library offers a variety of facilities including the Woodlands Library Gallery, MakeIT space, Calm Down to the Library area, a dedicated Children's seating area, and the Tamil Cholai section. Patrons can also take a 360 Virtual Tour of the library. These spaces provide diverse resources and environments for learning, relaxation, and community engagement.
Keyword_tag: library, gallery, MakeIT, children's area, virtual tour
full_address: 900 S Woodlands Dr, #01-03 Civic Centre, Singapore 730900
